subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At the N.B.A. draft lottery on Tuesday, a fortunate bounce of the Ping-Pong balls could lend a major boost to the rebuilding efforts of the Knicks’ new management.
snippet: At the N.B.A. draft lottery on Tuesday, a fortunate bounce of the Ping-Pong balls could lend a major boost to the rebuilding efforts of the Knicks’ new management.
